thread.title: Putin calls DNC hack public service, denies Russia's involvement
thread.title_full: Putin calls DNC hack public service, denies Russia's involvement | Fox News

author: PeterSkell
text:
Trump colludes with Putin, the multi-billionaire on a state salary. The guy who is deliberately bombing Syrian women and children (especially in hospitals) to stoke the refugee crisis to pile pressure onto the west over oil prices and Brexit.
Trump receives illegal favors from Putin rigging the election through hacks of voter registers, newspapers and falsifying of documents.
Trump, in return softened the GOPs platform on Ukraine and Crimea and undermined NATO.
Such a man should go nowhere near the Whitehouse.
